title: Space Launch - Ɔrbital tɛmpul
heading: Space Lanch we dɛn de lanch
intro: Dɛn dɔn plan fɔ lanch di Ɔbital Tɛmpl pan wan PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) pan Novɛmba 28, 2025 frɔm di Satish Dhawan Space Senta na Sriharikota, India.
partnership: Di Orbital Temple lonch na patnaship bitwin NewSpace India Limited (NSIL), we na Gɔvmɛnt fɔ India Kɔmni ɔnda Dipatmɛnt fɔ Spays, Antrix Kɔpɔreshɔn, ɛn di atis. Dis kolaboreshɔn ripresent wan impɔtant maylston fɔ art insay spɛs ɛksplɔrɔshɔn, we de briŋ togɛda India in spɛs program wit wan atis vishɔn fɔ radikal inkluziviti.

risks.heading: Risk dɛn we kin apin
risks.paragraph1: Dɛn bin bil di sataylayt fɔ bia wit bad bad vaybreshɔn kɔndishɔn ɛn tɛmal saykl, ɛn dɛn dɔn du strɔng tɛst. Bɔt, di spɛs lanch dɛn kin gɛt prɔblɛm dɛn we dɛn kin gɛt. If di sataylayt pwɛl we dɛn de lanch ɔ diploy am, ɔ if i nɔ ebul fɔ mek kɔmyunikeshɔn wit wi graɔn steshɔn dɛn, wi go wok fɔ sɔlv ɛn sɔlv ɛni prɔblɛm. Di sataylayt gɛt ridandant sistem ɛn bak-ap protɔkɔl dɛn we dɛn mek fɔ maksimayz di chans fɔ mek di mishɔn go bifo.
risks.paragraph2: Apat frɔm dat, di sataylayt kin de na di ɔbit fɔ lɛs 10 ia if di atmosfɛre kɔndishɔn ɔ ɔda tin dɛn mek di ɔbit rɔtin bifo tɛm. Pan ɔl we wi dɔn mek am fɔ las fɔ tɛn ia, di rial layf we i go liv de dipen pan tin dɛn we wi nɔ go ebul fɔ kɔntrol ɔl.
risks.paragraph3: If di fɔs lonch nɔ wok, ɔ if wi nɔ ebul fɔ du dis mishɔn lɛk aw wi bin dɔn plan, wi go fɛn ɔda rod dɛn fɔ go bifo, we kin inklud sɛkɔn lanch tray wit badjɛt we de, patnaship wit ɔda mishɔn dɛn, ɔ dɔkyumentri fɔ di tray as pat pan di artwok in narativ bɔt aspireshɔn ɛn limiteshɔn.

imageAlts.india: ISRO Space Senta, we de na India
